title: F1 LIVE: Qatar Grand Prix 2025 UK time, start time, grid, radio & updates
description: Follow live text updates and listen to radio commentary of the Qatar Grand Prix.
content:
'I’m over the moon because I didn't expect it' - Sainz
Carlos Sainz finishes third in the Williams: "I’m so happy and so proud of the team of what we have done today.

title: Welsh Rugby Union chair Richard Collier-Keywood wants to continue in role
description: WRU chair Richard Collier-Keywood says he is determined to carry on in his role after watching Wales suffer a record 73-0 defeat against South Africa.
content:
Welsh Rugby Union (WRU) chair Richard Collier-Keywood says he was "embarrassed" by Wales' 73-0 defeat against South Africa, but wants to continue to lead the organisation.
The 11-try hammering was a record home loss and the second worst result in Wel... [4452 chars]

title: Thousands march against Crowborough asylum seeker plan
description: The demonstrators oppose Home Office plans to house up to 540 male asylum seekers in the town.
content:
About 4,000 people have taken part in a demonstration against government plans to house asylum seekers at a military site in East Sussex, organisers have said.
The demonstrators oppose the Home Office's now delayed plan to temporarily house up to 540... [396 chars]

title: Qatar GP 2025: Verstappen win takes title fight to final race
description: Lando Norris, Max Verstappen and Oscar Piastri will contest a final-race championship showdown in Abu Dhabi after the Red Bull driver won a gripping Qatar Grand Prix.
content:
Lando Norris, Max Verstappen and Oscar Piastri will contest a final-race championship showdown in Abu Dhabi after Red Bull's Verstappen won a gripping Qatar Grand Prix.
Verstappen benefited from a strategy call from McLaren that flew in the face of d... [6142 chars]

title: Body of man recovered after major search off Sussex coast
description: A body has been recovered from the sea following a major search off the Sussex coast.
content:
At 10.19m today (November 30) the Coastguard received reports that a man had fallen overboard from a vessel off the coast at Newhaven.
A search involved RNLI lifeboats from Shoreham and Newhaven, along with a HM Coastguard rescue helicopter, a Coastg... [424 chars]
